Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Relates to the provision of breast pumps to certain incarcerated mothers
Summary: Relates to the provision of breast pumps and related collection and storage materials to all mothers who are confined in or committed to an institution or local correctional facility with or without their child subject to specific time limitations; requires institutions and local correctional facilities to provide pumps and related materials to such mothers, but not beyond the date such child reaches one year of age except in limited circumstances related to parole.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to providing breast pumps to certain incarcerated nursing mothers
